title: Microservices
description: We are seeking a Microservices Developer to design, build, and maintain scalable, modular services that power modern applications. Design and implement microservices architecture using best practices

title: Backend Developer
description: Backend developer required with expertise in Node.js and MongoDB. REST API development experience preferred. Collaborate with frontend developers and DevOps teams

title: Java Developer
description: Hiring Java developers with experience in Spring Boot. Microservices knowledge is mandatory. You will work on backend systems and work on all phases of the development lifecycle.

title: Python Developer
description: We need a Python developer skilled in Flask or Django. Experience with APIs and databases required. Integrate with databases and third-party services

title: Database Administrator
description: We are seeking a Database Administrator to manage and maintain our data infrastructure. Manage user access and enforce data security policies. Perform regular updates, patches, and migrations

title: IoT Developer
description: We are seeking a IoT Developer to design and build high-performance applications. Write clean, efficient, and maintainable in C/C++ code. Maintain documentation and follow coding standards

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Looking for DevOps engineers skilled in AWS, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines. Kubernetes experience preferred. Strong understanding of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)

title: UX/UI Designer
description: To design and implement engaging, user-friendly interfaces for web and mobile applications. Create wireframes, prototypes, and mockups using tools like Figma or Adobe XD

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Proficient in React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Should have experience in developing REST APIs and GraphQL. Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize performance

title: API Developer
description: API developer with knowledge of REST and GraphQL. Familiarity with security best practices in APIs required. You will ensure secure, scalable, and well-documented interfaces for internal and external use.

title: Software Developer
description: Looking for an experience software Developer with hands-on experince using AI/ML tools. Debug, test, and optimize code for performance and reliability
